entry.title: I'll Never be the Same
entry.summary:
Author: chaWOOPa

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,463Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: The sprain from last night isn't bad, but he has been feeling sick for a few days before it and appreciates the night off. Not just the night off, but the night off with Alfred.It's been almost three months since Tim agreed to stay with Alfred and just about two since it went from unofficial and unnamed to Alfred being his official Foster Father. Alfred's his dad now, even if Jack is still technically alive. The transition has been easier then Tim ever would have guessed, though with all of the changes followed by the Clench, they haven't had much time to just sit and exist together like this.

entry.title: Suneater
entry.summary:
Author: deepwinterstrawberry

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 239,173Chapters: 45/90Kudos: 84

Summary: Two years after graduating high school, Jason is eight inches taller, mentally and physically ill in a dozen new ways, and newly insecure in his ability to understand people. Now he and Cass are finally starting college and impossibly, things are somehow going well. Best of all, they’ve made two incredible friends: bombastic, warmhearted Stephanie Brown and her shy, sharp shadow, Tim Drake.College is still full of challenges, and not just the rigorous academic standards Jason holds himself to. For starters, people won’t stop telling him that his new best friend has the hots for him. That audacious, horny loser Conner Fucking Kent keeps trying to infect his insides. Spoiler, Burnside College’s self-appointed protector, keeps bumping into him. And of course, his body and brain are fucked up in ways that he’s somehow still discovering.It’s enough to make anyone want to run the fuck for the hills. Because Jason isn’t a coward, but he also isn’t an obnoxious asshole anymore; he isn’t a feisty, irrepressible little spitfire anymore; he isn’t the whip-smart top of his class anymore—and what does that even leave? Who the hell is he now, anyway?

entry.title: falling in love with myself again
entry.summary:
Author: cowboyboygirl

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,171Chapters: 1/2Kudos: 35

Summary: “Your hair’s too long.” Simon complains, pulling it off.“Really?” He genuinely hasn’t noticed. Unthinking, Kon brings a hand up to tug at the loose curl in the front that never seems to be tamed. Shrinkage is truly a deceiver; it reaches past his chin. And—huh. His curls do tickle the back of his neck now.“Yes,” Simon goes on, matter-of-fact as ever, “this was measured to account for your shorter haircut. I need to readjust. Again.”

entry.title: First Kontact
entry.summary:
Author: Chiyana

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 239,775Chapters: 32/?Kudos: 733

Summary: Two years after a disastrous first encounter with an alien entity called Necros, Captain Tim Drake is given his first mission back in the field. The simple six-month exploration mission babysitting a group of LexCorp researchers goes abruptly downhill upon the discovery of a missing colony ship, landing Tim directly back into the horror that took him out of the field in the first place and leading him to his second first encounter with an alien race. Usually he's all for over-achieving, but even he finds this to be a bit excessive.At least this time one of the aliens is more interested in him alive than dead.
